main event: On January 25, 1965, residents observed a round reddish-orange object emitting flashing lights over Bolar, Virginia.
interesting points: The object hovered for at least 45 minutes and emitted lights that appeared blue or green., The sighting occurred around 11:15 PM and then again at 10:45 PM on the same date., The object suddenly disappeared and reappeared in the same area., The altitude of the object was approximately 1000 feet or less., Local residents are cautious about discussing UFO sightings due to past attention from media.
sighted object: a round reddish-orange object with flashing lights
